name: A Light's Veracity
description:
WHAT WILL IT BE?!

Dodge and weave, in this dice-rolling bullet hell!

Each time you play WILL be unique, and to survive the longest you’ll need some Luck.

The Music also depends on the randomness! Depending on which shape attack there will be a slightly different soundtrack! I wonder how all the shapes sound together? 

How to play:

The game plays with only a mouse!

Moving your mouse will move the character! Make sure to be clicked into the game though!

You may also want to adjust your sensitivity in your settings to have more control, try and find a balance between control and speed!

Micr0byte - programming & design

dizaer - audio design & music

Browser Support:

  • Firefox v51+ (May glitch on Linux)
  • Chrome v56+ (Recommended)
  • Safari v15+ (requires macOS Monterey or newer)
  • Opera v43+
  • Edge v79+
  • Internet Explorer - Not supported

Known Bugs:

  • "Sensitivity Slider does nothing!" (Was thrown out in the last 15 mins due to some chaos)
  • Firefox on Linux Post Processing (Bloom, etc.) doesn't work sometimes

THANK YOU for your interest in my game!! 

Feel free to comment and rate it for the GMTK Game Jam accordingly!
